```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rootSolve)

```

```{r}
df <-read_csv("HW3_data.csv") %>%
  select(-1) %>%
  clean_names()
```
```{r}
model_1_dem_low <-lm(price_cents ~q_low_kwh, data = df)
model_1_dem_high <-lm(price_cents ~q_high_kwh, data = df)

model_1_dem_low
model_1_dem_high
```
```{r}
demand <-function(p,model)
  q <-(p - model$coefficients[[1]])/model$coefficients[[2]] 
  q <-ifelse(q<0,0,q)
  return(q)
```
